content.d: Let’s make today the best day ever!
Yes! Everyone welcomed us warmly yesterday, and we were able to perform comfortably!
It was interesting to hear stories about Fukuoka. Rina-chan Board says, “Gleaming!”
I want to report back to our fellow club members, but Kasumin really doesn’t want to leave yeeet!
Not wanting to leave but also wanting to leave is kinda contradictory, but I gotta agree with Little Puppy today.
This feeling... I want to convey this in a song.
Yeah. I want to convey this pleasant feeling of being close to everyone.
Since we’re here, wouldn’t it be nice if everyone in the venue could help create it?
Then, let’s put a Kasumin Box here and collect everyone’s opinions!
